tourName: Luxury Tour for Lovers: 12 Days of Thailand’s Beauty
placesVisited: Chiang Mai, Lampang, Bangkok, Khao Yai, Phuket, Koh Yao Noi
generalInfo: Thailand’s culture runs deep in the Northern capital of Chiang Mai, and its tropical beauty is best explored on immaculate white-sand beaches. Secluded opulence can be found within the bustling city of Bangkok, and romantic coastal adventures wait for you on the shores of Phuket. Cherish an intimate, 5-star escape to Thailand on this carefully curated couple’s tour. You and your partner will delve into the astounding cultural traditions, capture surreal vistas across the diverse landscape, and reconnect in the isolated splendor of the country’s premier resorts. Thailand’s beloved destinations await you on this passionate, 12-day tour that will have you daydreaming about Thailand for years to come.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Retreat to the Cultural Heart of Thailand
dayInfo.description: For your first stop in Thailand, you will escape to the culturally rich and scenically beautiful destination of Chiang Mai, where you and your partner will comfortably transfer to a premier resort that is tucked beneath the Doi Suthep Mountain. Slowly unpack your things and begin to feel the calm atmosphere as it resonates from the unspoiled wildlife that flanks the resort. From the luxury of your secluded balcony, you will witness sweeping landscape vistas, and spend the afternoon at your leisure as you acclimatize to the area around you. Whether you wish to lounge by the pool or experience a traditional couple’s Thai massage, intimate relaxation awaits, and world-class amenities will keep you thoroughly enthused and entertained.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – The Northern Capital’s Flawless Charm
dayInfo.description: Chiang Mai is a cultural hub that is home to an array of significant landmarks. You will journey to these pivotal locations shortly after waking up today. The Huay Kaew Waterfall cascades over large rocks that have been stuck within the luscious forest. It is an endearing spot to enjoy a romantic picnic as you soak up the natural splendor. A refreshing dip in the cool waters will revitalize your bodies, and afterward, you can venture to a decadent restaurant that overlooks the rainforest. Flowered walls encompass the terrace, the warm sun illuminates the tropical alcove, and delicately prepared Thai cuisine will send mouthwatering wafts of spices and flavors into the air. You will delight in complete romance for brunch at this prestigious restaurant, and later today, you and your partner will climb to the crest of Doi Suthep Mountain via cable car. The famous Wat Phra That temple sits strikingly atop the mountain’s peak. Colorful murals, elaborate statues, and delicate carvings adorn the golden temple’s complex. The viewpoint shares uninterrupted vistas of the greater Chiang Mai area, and you can capture these immaculate sights before you return to the base of the mountain and indulge in an award-winning meal from a nearby restaurant.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Visit a Riverside Town with Old-World Appeal
dayInfo.description: The following day, you will retreat to the old-world town of Lampang. Here, ornate horse-drawn wagons trot past the beautiful architecture that lines the streets. The unique romantic charm of this less-traveled riverside town is rarely rivaled, and you can immerse yourselves in Thai history as you visit the beloved temples and coveted museums. You can even capture unforgettable images as you enjoy intimate strolls with idyllic river backdrops. Finally, you will encounter magnificent elephants at an ethical sanctuary that is dedicated to the rehabilitation of these impressive creatures. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, your day tour to Lampang will leave you at your luxurious accommodation, satisfied and excited for the days to come.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Remarkable Sunsets on a Regal River Cruise
dayInfo.description: You will travel to Bangkok on the fourth day of your trip for exclusive experiences in Thailand’s thriving capital. You will transfer to your luxury hotel that is located on the banks of the famous Chao Phraya River, which is an immaculate body of water that flows through the magnificent cityscape. Your lavish suite will share panoramic views of these scenes, and shortly afterward, you will glide across the water on a regal river cruise. You can lose yourselves in the sheer luxury of this experience as exceptional head chefs prepare remarkable Thai dishes for your candlelit dinner date, and stellar live performances will provide entertainment as you explore the wonderful flavors. The sky will turn shades of pink and orange as the day slowly gives way to the night, and you will conclude your gourmet dinner with a sumptuous dessert while the moon dances in the sky.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Bangkok’s Beloved Attractions
dayInfo.description: A trip to Bangkok will be incomplete without an in-depth exploration of its prominent and cultural landmarks. Sprawled across the bustling city are some of Thailand’s most revered temples or Wats. Your experienced tour guide for the day will collect you at your hotel and transfer you to these monumental and spiritual sites. As you wander through the sacred halls of Bangkok’s beloved temples, you will feel a sense of great admiration for the spiritual dedication of the people who call this country home. Wat Pho boasts a momentous golden, reclining Buddha while Wat Phra Kaew houses the world-famous Emerald Buddha. Each distinguished Wat has been meticulously crafted, and beyond the picture-perfect moments, they share great insight into ancient Buddhist spirituality. Later, you can visit an authentic Thai market for a vibrant tour of traditional cuisine and weave through the lively stalls, which are lined with local delicacies that you will rarely be able to find anywhere else. Following lunch, you will transfer to recognized museums and art galleries in the city, which is where you will uncover ancient artifacts and local talent as you visit premier cultural hotspots. Finally, conclude your evening with gourmet dinner atop one of Bangkok’s towering skyscrapers. With a 360-degree view of the entire city, you will delight in intimate dining like never before.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – A Taste for the Finer Things
dayInfo.description: You will begin your final day in Bangkok, developing your taste for Thailand. You will transfer to a prestigious cooking school for an insightful and intimate morning of mastering the culinary arts. After stocking up on local produce at a spirited morning market, you and your partner will work alongside an exceptional chef and learn to prepare world-famous Thai meals. You will return from the experience with a wealth of knowledge for your next Thai-inspired dinner party. Then, you will continue your romantic day with a leisurely stroll through Lumphini Park, where you can meander the winding paths of the pristine park and spend the afternoon amongst the plants. Finally, your day will end at Bangkok’s premier retail district, which is where you will have the opportunity to browse the upper-class stores in search of fashionable items and elegant keepsakes that you will struggle to find anywhere else. An immaculate meal alongside the Chao Phraya River will bring your fabulous time in Bangkok to an end.

dayInfo.title: Khao Yai – Escape to the Wilderness
dayInfo.description: The immense Khao Yai National Park, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is one of Thailand’s greatest wildlife treasures. For nature-loving couples, this destination offers an incredible escape from the bustling energy of Thailand’s cities. You will transfer to Khao Yai via luxury coach from Bangkok. During the journey, you can capture riveting images of Thailand’s idyllic countryside as the rugged mountain terrain and sprawling green landscape will sweep you away. Afterward, you will be transferred to a tropical haven within the boundless national park. Luxury will exude from your accommodation that will be set among the pristine wilderness. The resort blends modern sophistication and authentic traditional architecture to create a space of luxurious intimacy. Your private suite will boast wondrous vistas of the enchanting wildlife, so you will have plenty of opportunities for sight-seeing from the comforts of your luxurious accommodation. Your stay will epitomize leisure and paradise, and shortly after you have arrived, you will experience a relaxing spa treatment as you are surrounded by nature. Expertly trained masseuses will ease away any tension as you and your partner re-center your minds and bodies. You will finish your elaborate welcome spoils with gourmet dining at the resort’s prestigious restaurant. With a spread of local and international cuisine on the menu, you will be utterly spoiled for choice.

dayInfo.title: Khao Yai – A World that is Bursting with Life
dayInfo.description: The following day, you will be whisked away into the wilderness on a safari that will give you unparalleled experiences with local wildlife. You will traverse the tropical rainforest in search of majestic creatures that are indigenous to Thailand. As you venture further, you may marvel at peaceful elephants that are rumbling across the jungle floor and capture images of colorful birds as they flutter overhead. Delight in sights of gibbons as they leap through the canopy. In the rainforest, there will be an abundance of wildlife to discover on this impressive safari excursion that you may not forget any time soon. You will further experience the wonderful nature around you as you enjoy an intimate hike to a marvelous viewpoint as well as bathe in a stunning waterfall. In the evening, you will continue your expedition on a unique evening safari through the luscious foliage. This time, you will search for the impressive nocturnal creatures that call Khao Yai home. Accompanied by your expert guides, you will feel completely comfortable and are bound to discover many nocturnal creatures.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Intimate Leisure amid Surreal Scenery
dayInfo.description: With vibrant cities and splendid wilderness checked off of your travel list, it will be off to a seaside paradise on the ninth day of your trip. You will transfer back to Bangkok from Khao Yai, where you will take a brisk plane to the renowned Phuket Island. As you descend into Phuket International Airport, you will witness what makes the island so unique. Encompassing the vast coastlines are paper-white beaches and turquoise oceans, and sprawling across the landscapes are luscious forests and ornate Buddhist temples. The views are seemingly lifted straight from a postcard, capturing the tropical destination’s immense beauty. You will transfer to your luxurious villa in the Cape Panwa area. Off the beaten path, this picture-perfect location boasts unspoiled beaches with crystal clear waters. You can spend the afternoon soaking up the sun at one of these pristine palm tree-lined shores. Tonight, you will bring your evening to a splendid close with excellently-prepared seafood dishes at a revered, seaside restaurant.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Explore a Postcard Coastline
dayInfo.description: The following day, you will explore the best secrets that Thailand has off the coast of Phuket. You will meet your knowledgeable private guide after a sumptuous breakfast, and from the comfort of a luxurious speed boat, you will set off on a riveting island hop to secluded, island destinations. With only your guide to direct you, you and your partner will indulge in complete serenity as you spend the day in each other’s company. The beaches that you visit will grant you with beautiful snorkeling opportunities. You can dip your heads into the warm waters and dive in search of the magical marine life where you may encounter a vast collection of impressive creatures as you wade past the colorful coral reefs. You will create lifelong memories of your adventurous exploits with an underwater camera before settling under the shaded palm trees and letting time slowly pass. Once you have experienced enough of the tranquil atmosphere, you can return to the shore later today for lunch at an elegant, seaside restaurant. Afterward, you will have the opportunity to completely relax on the paradise island from the comfort of your secluded beach. Ultimately, you will indulge in Thai cuisine for dinner. Your stay in Phuket will provide you with the perfect opportunity to unwind and connect as you enjoy long romantic walks on the beach and reminisce about your journey thus far.

dayInfo.title: Koh Yao Noi – A Romantic Retreat Less-Traveled
dayInfo.description: You will revel in more of the secluded island paradise the following day as you transfer to the idyllic island of Koh Yao Noi via private speed boat. This renowned destination boasts world-class resorts with remarkable ocean vistas. You will arrive at one of the most exclusive resorts on the islands and check into your luxurious villa by the sea. Set amongst the enchanting green hills, you will be completely immersed in nature at this luxury accommodation and will feel worlds away as you soak up the isolated splendor. This is the perfect final destination for your romantic tour of Thailand. You can spend your afternoon traversing the white-sand beaches or swimming in the azure oceans. The sea will be teeming with life and equipped with your snorkels, so you can discover awe-inspiring moments together. To culminate your day of true relaxation, you will indulge in a gourmet meal at the resort’s exceptional restaurant, where you will delight in deliciously prepared meals as you witness magical sunsets by candlelight.

dayInfo.title: Koh Yao Noi – Nourish Your Minds, Bodies, and Souls
dayInfo.description: The following day, you will indulge all of your senses with an endearing yoga and spa treatment. You and your partner will participate in an utterly engaging experience that will be geared towards reinvigorating your minds, bodies, and souls. Accompanied by professionals, you will brush away all stresses and lose yourselves in the ancient-inspired practices. This is an intimate opportunity for you to reminisce about your recent experiences through Thailand and celebrate your love together. The retreat will leave you refreshed and ready to make your way back home. Finally, you will enjoy one last meal that will be prepared by the revered chefs at the prestigious resort restaurant. This will round off your incredibly uplifting and intimate stay in true style before your return home, having created lifelong memories and captured magnificent moments of your unforgettable adventures.
